Articles.Content: Has anybody found any ridiculously flat regions on the Mun. Something like the Sea of Tranquility?
I use the kgss maps to find perfect landing spots.

Aye, the large impact basins tend to be smoother than the rest of the Mun (though the difference is a lot less in the paid version than in the demo). It may behoove you to build a very squat , wide-footed lander, so you don't have to care very much about the slipe of the terrain underneath the lander.

there are several

look at the map i made with the mapsat plugin

http://kspwiki.nexisonline.net/kspw/images/8/83/Isa_mapsat_mun_map800.gif

avoid the red an yellow areas and try spots where there is a large area of the same colour.
